text:
The [[University of Wynarn]] dominates the Knowledge Ward.
The rest of the ward is given over to meager student
housing, inexpensive public houses, and a small
[[enclave|Adaran enclave of Fairhaven]] of several hundred [[kalashtar]].

!! Noteworthy Locations

* [[University of Wynarn]]
* ''University Place Alehouse'' (tavern)
* ''The Ribald Rector'' (tavern)
* ''Dragonhawk Reagents'' (supplies)
* ''Dome of Light'' (temple to the [[Path of Light]], within the [[Adaran enclave of Fairhaven]])
title: Knowledge Ward
